message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to make another counteroffer: $105. It's the best I can do.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92.50?
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $100. It's my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87.50?
I'm not willing to go that low, Bob. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $98. It's my last offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $85?
